overview: Biometric stealing is when someone takes your unique body details.
This could be your fingerprint or a scan of your face.
They use these details to pretend to be you.
important_tips: Never share your One Time Password (OTP) with anyone.
Always keep your important papers and documents safe at home.
Carefully check payment links before you click to pay.
how_it_works: Scammers might trick you into touching a fake fingerprint reader.
They could also secretly take a picture of your face.
They then make a copy that looks exactly like your real biometric detail.
They use this fake copy to get into places or systems that think it's you.
red_flags: Someone asks for your fingerprint or face scan in a strange place.
A device for scanning looks cheap, old, or out of place.
You are asked for your biometrics for something that doesn't make sense.
prevention_steps: Be very careful where you place your finger or scan your face.
Only use trusted machines and at places you know well, like banks or government offices.
Do not let unknown people take photos or videos of your face without a good reason.
real_world_examples: Imagine a small shop asks you to put your thumb on a strange machine for a 'special discount'.
Someone might promise a new government scheme and ask to scan your face at a roadside stall.
A fake online form might ask for a picture of your face to 'verify' your identity for a prize.
what_to_do_if_you_are_a_victim: Immediately tell your bank if any money is involved or accounts are accessed.
Talk to a family member or friend you trust about what happened.
Report the incident to the local police station.
safe_checklist: Do I truly understand why someone is asking for my fingerprint or face scan?
Is this place or person a trusted source for my personal details?
Does the machine or setup for scanning look official and safe?
legal_help_and_reporting: You should report the scam to your nearest police station.
You can also call the national helpline number for cybercrimes.
Your bank can help you if your account was used without your permission.
